frontmatter.title: Breaded Dandan Meatballs with Udon Noodles, Chinese Cabbage, and Sweet Paprika
frontmatter.description: A savory and satisfying dish featuring breaded Dandan meatballs served with udon noodles, Chinese cabbage, and sweet paprika.
frontmatter.author: Benjamin Degryse
